required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multicenter, Prospective, Randomized Trial of Adjuvant Chemotherapy for Early-Stage Cervical Cancer Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Prospective, Randomized Trial of Adjuvant Chemotherapy for Early-Stage Cervical Cancer Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.source: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: We will conduct a trial to determine whether paclitaxel/cisplatin (TP) as an adjuvant chemotherapy after radical surgery improve disease-free survival (DFS) and overall survival (OS), as well as the quality of life (QoL) among early-stage (FIGO stage IB-IIA) cervical cancer patients with risk factors.

primary_outcome.measure: disease-free survival (DFS) of the adjuvant chemotherapy arm (arm A)
primary_outcome.description: DFS was definite as the time from randomization to disease recurrence (including death from recurrence if it was the first manifestation of recurrence), death without recurrence.

secondary_outcome.measure: DFS of the adjuvant CCRT arm (arm B)
3-year overall survivals (OS) of the arm A and the arm B
Quality of Life in two arms
chemotherapy- and radiotherapy- related adverse effects respectively in two arms

arm_group.description: Paclitaxel (T): 135-175 mg/m(2) intravenously (IV) on day 1, administrated intravenously over 3 hours; followed by cisplatin 75-85 mg/m(2) IV on day 2 and 3. Patients received at least 3 cycles at 4-week intervals beginning 2-3 weeks after surgery. 3-6 cycles as necessary.
Pelvic RT is delivered using IMRT technique, 45～50.4 Gy/4～7 weeks, brachytherapy will been given as necessary. Cisplatin 35 mg/m(2) IV once a week. Total treatment time is 6-7 weeks.

intervention.intervention_name: radical hysterectomy + pelvic lymph node dissection

overall_official.affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

facility.name: Tongji Hospital, Tongji Medical College, Huazhong University of Science and Technology
Women's Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
responsible_party.investigator_title: Director of Department of Gynecology and Obstetrics
